events.comment: Every time Loading the layout intialize the required GlobalVar's to default instead of setting all Globalvariables Defult
Creat aLocal storage for HighScore if doesn't Exist
If the player is above the scroll position, scroll up to the player's position.

sub-events.comment: As we are scrolling, if the top of the screen has reached the position of the next platform to create, create it at a position across the top of the screen. Then also set another platform to be created at a distance Space up again,Andadd 1to Platform count

events.comment: Always scroll to the current top position the player has reached, but never scroll horizontally.
Use left and right arrow keys to control the Frog or tilt the mobile.

events.comment: If game over update the high score and go to game over screen
